plot: Ram and Janani's three stages of love - their attraction for each other during their school days, their love at college days, and the relationship when they mature.
plot_es: Ram and Janani's three stages of love - their attraction for each other during their school days, their love at college days, and the relationship when they mature.
plot_en: Ram and Janani's three stages of love - their attraction for each other during their school days, their love at college days, and the relationship when they mature.
